bibl.title: OGIS 98 and the Divination of the Ptolemies
bibl.note: O.G.I.S. I, 98 = I. Philae I, 8 (186-180 B.C.) is the first of many dedications made by the Ptolemies of the 2nd and 1st centuries B.C., in which they employ their divine titulature. - Observations on the history and development of divine kingship in Ptolemaic Egypt.
JOHNSON Carl Garth, OGIS 98 and the Divinization of the Ptolemies.
